title: Elie Honig: Hatchet Man
description: Michael talks with former prosecutor, CNN Senior Legal Analyst Elie Honig, author of "Hatchet Man: How Bill Barr Broke the Prosecutor's Code and Corrupted the Justice Department." Original air date 9 July 2021. The book was published on 6 July 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Elie Honig)
